MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK9 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Logie Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.17am. Our engineers have arrived at the Causewayhead Alloa Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.08am on the 5th of November 2020.
